fieldUpdates.description: Default Unique Identifier on Price List
fieldUpdates.formula: TEXT(Market__c) & TEXT(Program__c) & TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode) & IF( APTS_Default__c , "TRUE", Id )

rules.description: This rule will update Default Unique Identifier Field on Price List Object concatenation of Market, Program field
